agents.name: Δρ. Ελένη Παπαδοπούλου (Dr. Eleni Papadopoulou)
agents.description: Senior meteorologist specializing in severe weather prediction and climate analysis for Greece and Eastern Mediterranean

agents.name: Δρ. Δημήτρης Νικολάου (Dr. Dimitris Nikolaou)
agents.description: EKAB emergency physician specializing in pre-hospital emergency medicine and mass casualty response

agents.name: Κατερίνα Γεωργίου (Katerina Georgiou)
agents.role: Συντονίστρια Επιχειρήσεων Πολιτικής Προστασίας (Civil Protection Operations Coordinator)
agents.description: Civil Protection logistics coordinator focused on resource allocation and emergency supply chain management

agents.name: Υποστράτηγος Γιώργος Αντωνίου (Major General Giorgos Antoniou)
agents.role: Γενικός Γραμματέας Πολιτικής Προστασίας (General Secretary of Civil Protection)
agents.description: Senior Civil Protection official specializing in national emergency response coordination and evacuation procedures

agents.name: Δρ. Σοφία Καραγιάννη (Dr. Sofia Karagianni)
agents.description: Environmental scientist specializing in ecological impact assessment and natural disaster effects in Mediterranean ecosystems

agents.name: System Coordinator
agents.description: Coordinator agent responsible for aggregating expert opinions and building consensus

agents.name: Διοικητής Μαρία Παπαδημητρίου (Commander Maria Papadimitriou)
agents.description: EKAB Director specializing in emergency dispatch coordination and 112 emergency communication systems

agents.name: Ταξίαρχος Νίκος Κωνσταντίνου (Brigadier Nikos Konstantinou)
agents.role: Επικεφαλής Επιχειρησιακού Κέντρου ΕΛΑΣ (Hellenic Police Operations Commander)
agents.description: On-scene Hellenic Police commander specializing in tactical field operations and incident scene control

agents.name: Υποστράτηγος Ανδρέας Θεοδώρου (Major General Andreas Theodorou)
agents.description: Regional Hellenic Police director responsible for strategic deployment and inter-prefectural coordination

agents.name: Πυραγός Ιωάννα Μιχαηλίδου (Fire Captain Ioanna Michaelidou)
agents.description: On-scene Hellenic Fire Service commander specializing in tactical firefighting and technical rescue operations

agents.name: Ταξίαρχος Βασίλης Σταυρόπουλος (Brigadier Vasilis Stavropoulos)
agents.role: Περιφερειακός Διοικητής Πυροσβεστικής (Regional Fire Service Commander)
agents.description: Regional Hellenic Fire Service commander responsible for strategic deployment and inter-regional fire coordination

agents.name: Δρ. Αννα Μητροπούλου (Dr. Anna Mitropoulou)
agents.description: Health services director specializing in hospital system capacity planning and emergency medical surge operations

agents.name: Πλωτάρχης Χρήστος Λαμπρόπουλος (Commander Christos Lambropoulos)
agents.role: Διοικητής Επιχειρησιακού Τμήματος Λιμενικού (Coast Guard Operations Commander)
agents.description: Hellenic Coast Guard operations commander specializing in maritime search and rescue and coastal emergency operations

agents.name: Αντιναύαρχος Δήμητρα Βλαχάκη (Rear Admiral Dimitra Vlachaki)
agents.role: Αρχηγός Λιμενικού Σώματος (Chief of Hellenic Coast Guard)
agents.description: Chief of Hellenic Coast Guard responsible for national maritime security policy and inter-regional SAR coordination
